description: First differences between n for which sigma(n) < sigma(n+1).
comments: It seems that the expansion consists of only {1,2,3,4}.The first exception is a(10010491) = 6, corresponding to the gap from 20021153 to 20021159. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 09 2014
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: with(numtheory): f := [seq( `if`((sigma(i+1) > sigma(i)),i,print( )), i=1..5000)];seq( f[i+1] - f[i], i=1..2000);
prog: (Haskell)a053230 n = a053230_list !! (n-1)a053230_list = zipWith (-) (tail a053224_list) a053224_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 07 2012(PARI) last=ls=1; for(n=2,200,ns=sigma(n+1); if(ls>=ns,ls=ns; next); ls=ns; print1(n-last", ");last=n) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 09 2014
author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu), Jan 10 2000
